net.sf.wubiq.print.attribute

Class CustomMediaSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.print.attribute.Size2DSyntax
      • javax.print.attribute.standard.MediaSize
        • net.sf.wubiq.print.attribute.CustomMediaSize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.print.attribute.Attribute

    public class CustomMediaSize
extends javax.print.attribute.standard.MediaSize
    Represents custom media size. Java implementations are known for not allowing landscape media size definition. This class can be used for creating any custom media size including landscape ones. There are no accessible constructor, any instance must be created using the static method createCustomMediaSize.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • createCustomMediaSize

        public static CustomMediaSize createCustomMediaSize(float width,
                                                    float height,
                                                    int units)
        Creates a custom media size. If necessary it also creates a net.sf.wubiq.print.attribute.CustomMediaSizeName and associates it with this instance.
        Parameters:
        width - Width. Can be larger than height.
        height - Height. Can be smaller than width.
        units - Units to use either javax.print.attribute.standard.MediaSize.INCH or .MM.
        Returns:
        A previously created custom media size or a newly created one.
